desc.p: This is the name of the routine / API which is used to perform the latest hedge effectiveness calculations.
Should be a valid Subroutine - i.e. should have a PGM.FILE entry of type S.
The ID of the Hedge Method to be used.Records should be created for each variation of the hedging methods and calculations to be used.
This is the name of the routine / API which is used to perform the checking that the Hedge Group can be applied to the contract on Input.
Should be a valid Subroutine - i.e. should have a PGM.FILE entry of type S.
